channel.title: python on lvbibir's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in python on lvbibir's Blog

item.title: python批量修改目录下文件名
item.description: import os # 输入文件夹地址 path = "C://Users//lvbibir//Desktop//lvbibir.github.io//content//posts//read//" files = os.listdir(path) # 输出所有文件名，只是为了确认一下 for file in files: print(file) # 获取旧名和新名 i = 0 for file in files: # 旧名称的信息 old = path + os.sep + files[i] # 新名

item.title: 批量导出&导入docker镜像
item.description: python方式 批量导出，运行后所有tar包都在当前目录下 # encoding: utf-8 import re import os import subprocess if __name__ == "__main__": p = subprocess.Popen('docker images', shell=True, stdout=subprocess.PIPE, stderr=subprocess.STDOUT) for line in p.stdout.readlines(): # 此处的正则表达式是为了匹配镜像名
